neg review: Extended with one night, and the price went up 300%.  For the same room... Almost criminal to ask that much money.

pos review: A fine hotel for one or two nights. Only spent the night there so I couldn't tell something about the restaurant, but the rooms were clean and tidy. Nice showers. Close to the center.
neg review: Didn't like the neighborhood but the hotel can't help that
Its a little old but thats the bad only thing. And for the price, thats ignorable.

pos review: This is a very conveniently located hotel with very friendly staff, clean comfortable rooms and a good breakfast
neg review: My one gripe on the continent - no tea or coffee making facilities in the rooms

pos review: Good central location across from railway station
neg review: Although a good location very noisy outside from  railway station and early morning revellers!

pos review: Awesome hotel with nice location near the center )))
Location was great just near the station. Good WiFi. Single room was a fair size for a single.
neg review: Was a large impersonal hotel. Carpets were quite stained and dirty. Restaurant they claimed to be open every night was not on the night I tried to eat there and the night b4 was booked for a group.
